content: light and airy the willow cardigan is the ultimate summer project simple crochet stitches and chains combine to create a drapey lace cardigan that s a lot easier to crochet than it seems the cardigan follows a simple construction and a back panel and 2 front panels that are sewn together and edged in single crochets with a relaxed comfy fit the willow cardigan pairs well over jeans dresses or use it as a cover up at the beach this pattern is also accompanied by a stitch chart and photos sizes xs-s m-l 1x-2x skill level easy this pattern is written in english using us crochet terms sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
